name: Friday Night Pretender
description:
The DJ is gone missing, and you just happened to be in the wrong place at the wrong time. Now you need to improvise with a defective turntable to keep the crowd from getting out of there a little too early.

You don't have the proper tools for this job, but you have to keep the music running by tinkering with that turntable. Try to keep the rhythm coming!

How to play :

Try to repair the different modules of your turntable everytime it breaks down. Don't lose all your groove!

Staff - “Plancha Corp” :

Hugo Beaucamps - Developer
Olivier Brissez - Developer
Guillaume De Tomasi - Composer / Ui
Grégoire Duflo - 2D Art / Animation

Keys binding:

Q: Yellow rhythm key
W: Purple rhythm key
E: Green rhythm key
R: Red rhythm key

Install instructions :

Click to itch.io link,

And Play !
